/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the various colors of the cars and buildings.
